alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 27 at 8:58AM CDT until June 27 at 9:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM CDT FOR LINCOLN AND SOUTHEASTERN PAYNE COUNTIES... At 858 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles northwest of Quay to 4 miles southeast of Stroud to near Prague, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Cushing, Chandler, Perkins, Stroud, Prague, Yale, Meeker, Davenport, Wellston, Carney, Tryon, Ripley, Agra, Sparks, Warwick, Kendrick, Fallis, Quay, and Avery. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
